metadata.description: Examples of work that should not be estimated with story points

nonEstimableWork.title: Research OAuth Implementation Options
nonEstimableWork.learningObjective: Understand OAuth 2.0 implementation complexity and choose appropriate library
acceptanceCriteria: Evaluate 3 OAuth libraries for our tech stack
Document security considerations and trade-offs
Create proof-of-concept with Google OAuth
Estimate implementation effort for chosen approach
nonEstimableWork.reasoning: High uncertainty about implementation approach requires research before estimation is possible. The spike will provide information needed to break down and estimate the actual implementation work.

nonEstimableWork.title: Database Performance Analysis
nonEstimableWork.learningObjective: Identify performance bottlenecks in user search functionality and determine optimization approach
acceptanceCriteria: Profile current search queries with large datasets
Identify slow queries and missing indexes
Research database optimization techniques
Document recommended optimization strategy
transitionToStories: Add database indexes for user search
nonEstimableWork.reasoning: Performance issues require investigation to understand root causes before solutions can be estimated. The research will inform specific optimization stories.

nonEstimableWork.title: Real-time Notification System POC
nonEstimableWork.learningObjective: Validate technical feasibility of WebSocket-based notifications and assess integration complexity
acceptanceCriteria: Create basic WebSocket connection handling
Implement simple notification delivery
Test with multiple concurrent users
Document scalability and infrastructure requirements
transitionToStories: Add notification persistence and retry logic
nonEstimableWork.reasoning: New technology with unknown integration challenges. POC will validate approach and reveal implementation complexity for proper estimation.

nonEstimableWork.title: Team Training on New Testing Framework
nonEstimableWork.learningObjective: Bring team up to speed on new testing framework to maintain development velocity
acceptanceCriteria: All team members complete framework tutorial
Team practices writing tests for existing components
Establish testing patterns and conventions
Update development workflow documentation
transitionToStories: Migrate existing tests to new framework
Add integration tests for user management
nonEstimableWork.reasoning: Learning activities are investments in team capability rather than deliverable features. Time-boxing ensures focused learning while enabling future story estimation with new knowledge.

nonEstimableWork.title: Third-party API Integration Feasibility
nonEstimableWork.learningObjective: Assess integration complexity with external payment processing API and identify potential issues
acceptanceCriteria: Test API authentication and basic operations
Understand rate limiting and error handling requirements
Evaluate webhook reliability and security
Document integration architecture recommendations
transitionToStories: Add webhook handling for payment events
Create payment error handling and retry logic
nonEstimableWork.reasoning: External API integration has unknown complexity due to third-party constraints. Spike reduces uncertainty and enables accurate estimation of implementation stories.

nonEstimableWork.title: Accessibility Compliance Assessment
nonEstimableWork.learningObjective: Evaluate current application against WCAG 2.1 AA standards and identify required improvements
acceptanceCriteria: Audit existing components with accessibility tools
Test with screen readers and keyboard navigation
Document compliance gaps and severity levels
Prioritize improvements by impact and effort
transitionToStories: Add ARIA labels to form components
Improve color contrast in data tables
nonEstimableWork.reasoning: Compliance assessment requires systematic evaluation before specific improvements can be identified and estimated. Research provides foundation for targeted accessibility stories.
